LanguageData.SGM.PocketMapDisallowed: Stargates cannot be placed on pocket maps.
LanguageData.SGM.GateDialFailed: Could not activate stargate: Receiving gate no longer exists or is currently in use.
LanguageData.SGM.CannotWake: Cannot wake gate: Active gate already present.
LanguageData.SGM.GateHibernating: Address conflict: Gate in hibernation mode.
LanguageData.SGM.RespawnGateString: Please respawn this gate (and its accompanying DHD) using devmode, as an update has broken it.
LanguageData.SGM.WakeHibernationDesc: Wake this stargate from hibernation, making it the active gate for this map.
LanguageData.SGM.OpenCloseIrisDesc: Open or close this stargate's iris.
LanguageData.SGM.CreateSGSiteDesc: Create a new stargate site at this location.
LanguageData.SGM.RenameGateSiteDesc: Rename this stargate site to a more recognizable name.
LanguageData.SGM.TransmitGDODesc: Transmit an identification code through the gate, identifying yourself as friendlies and opening the iris on your stargate.
LanguageData.SGM.SelectConnectedGateDesc: View and select the gate on the other side.
LanguageData.CannotWake: Cannot wake gate: Active gate already present.
LanguageData.SGM.BringThingToGateAction: Bring item or pawn to stargate
LanguageData.SGM.CarryHeldToStargateAction_Disabled: Cannot carry to stargate: stargate not active
LanguageData.SGM.CannotDecodeSGSymbols: Cannot decode: glyph deciphering not researched
LanguageData.SGM.CannotDialGateIsActive: Cannot dial: stargate is already active
LanguageData.SGM.CannotDialInvalidAddress: Stargate has no registered address. (Try reinstalling this stargate)
LanguageData.ToggleablePatchesText: Optional patch-based settings from this mod can be found in the Vanilla Expanded Framework settings, under "Toggleable Patches"
